text:
operational target identifies how an objective could beachieved and should indicate the following:
•specific measures to effect the desired change;
•priority population group; and
•target dates.
Strategies should be determined.
Strategies are approaches or techniques to facilitate
accomplishment of set objectives and targets.
One strategy may apply to one or several objectives, or
sometimes to the whole programme.  Multiple strategiesmay be applied to one objective.
